title: Pix2Pix
description: I implemented pix2pix and tried to generate the comic book character from the real photo. I like to read comic books and have dreamed of myself becoming a character some day. And the time comes. If we use the pix2pix, I can make my dream comes true. Thus I tried to make comic book character from the real photo by using pix2pix. At first I tuned my pix2pix model by using Facades dataset, which is used in original paper. After that I tried to make myself a comic books character. Though the output was somewhat blurred, I could change my photo like a comic book character.(https://ryotakemuraryo.github.io/pix2pix/)

title: Mahjong AI
description: Is it possible to design an AI algorithm that behaves similar to human players ranging from beginning to master for the simple-styled Shanghai mahjong? The data used represents training data by simulations and measures the skill expression of our agent given a starting hand. Our environment is used to guide the AI algorithm how to behave as an agent with a goal to win but with differentiating skill levels.(https://ryotakemuraryo.github.io/MahjongAI/)

title: Geospatial visualizations
description: I built an immersive, interactive map visualization of bike traffic in the Boston area during different times of the day

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization?
description: I designed two visualizations to persuade a reader about each side of the proposition; one is on the side and the other is against the side!(https://ryotakemuraryo.github.io/Assignment2/)

title: Start studying abroad in University of California San Diego.
description: I start stuydying abroad at University of California San Diego from this september to June 2025. I'll mainly study energy engineering and computer science!
